description: Partial quotients in continued fraction expansion of 2C-1, where C is Cahen's constant.
references: J. L. Davison, Jeffrey Shallit, Continued Fractions for Some Alternating Series, Monatsh. Math., 111 (1991), 119-126.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
